main event: A pilot observed an unidentified object near Columbus, Ohio, on 22 December 1951.
interesting points: The object was seen moving at high speed with no sound,The pilot believed the object was likely a balloon after further investigation,The sighting lasted for approximately 1 to 1Â½ minutes before the object was lost in the sun,The object appeared to be an aircraft without a tail and was silver in color,The F-84 pilot described the object as rolling or tumbling in the air during the observation.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object resembling an aircraft without a tail
witness description: an F-84 jet pilot with combat experience and approximately 1700 flying hours
